long_description: vladimíra glatzová clients don't need a lawyer who's looking for problems. martin dančišin we always adapt our approach to each client's expectations. partner since 2009 expert on restructuring and insolvency, real estates, banking & finance, dispute resolution. jindřich král finding a solution is not enough. to understand a client's question is not enough. partner since 2015 expert on banking & finance, dispute agenda, financial markets regulations. what they're looking for is advice on what to do. partner since 2019 expertise in m&a, energy, dispute resolution, corporate law. partner since 2020 expertise in m&a, employment, dispute resolution and corporate law. we operate in the czech republic and in slovakia. because of the close collaboration between our office in bratislava and our headquarters in prague, we can provide our clients with one law firm that provides the same high-quality, coordinated legal services in both the czech republic and slovakia. with 29 years of stable, organic growth driving us, we've established ourselves as one of the top independent law firms in the czech republic and slovakia , and one of the oldest law firms in the czech republic.
generated_description: glatzova, legally known as slovak republic glatzova & co., is an independent law firm based in prague, czech republic. established over 25 years ago, it is one of the oldest law firms in the czech republic. the firm provides a wide range of legal services, including corporate law, mergers and acquisitions, banking and finance, real estate, restructuring and insolvency, labor law, intellectual property, and it. glatzova operates in both the czech republic and slovakia, offering coordinated legal services through its branches in prague and bratislava. the firm is known for its high-quality legal services and has been recognized for its expertise in various legal areas.
